email.subject: Something of interest
email.body:
Thx for the game!
The game source code says, that the full release date is around 1993 - such a shame I have to wait that long...
BUT, I found this server (see attachment) looking over your past network scans. Seems VERY secure - probaly military!
It has some sort of "GAMES" listed. But we need admin access to see/play the games...
MAYBE you can get more info about the designer of the server and find an "admin" "back-door".
----- - Try to login with "help" and "games" - that sometimes works... - If you get access to the "game files", find some sort of "author name" (like "Jim") and reply the name back to me. -----
- Malvin
